lyrics:
12 contributorsbelieve lyricsverse 1
im still trying to figure out how to tell you i was wrong
i cant fill the emptiness inside since youve been gone
so is it you or is it me
i know i said things that i didnt mean
but you shouldve known me by now
you shouldve known me

chorus
if you believed
when i said
id be better off without you
then you never really knew me at all
if you believed
when i said
that i wouldnt be thinking about you
you thought you knew the truth but youre wrong
youre all that i need
just tell me that you still believe

verse 2
i cant undo the things that led us to this place
but i know theres something more to us than our mistakes
so is it you or is it me
i know im so blind when we dont agree
but you shouldve known me by now
you shouldve known me
see skillet liveget tickets as low as 60you might also likechorus
if you believed
when i said
id be better off without you
then you never really knew me at all
if you believed
when i said
that i wouldnt be thinking about you
you thought you knew the truth but youre wrong
youre all that i need
just tell me that you still believe

guitar solo

interlude
is it you or is it me
i know i said things that i didnt mean
you should have known me by now
you shouldve known me

chorus
if you believed
when i said
id be better off without you
then you never really knew me at all
if you believed
when i said
that i wouldnt be thinking about you
you thought you knew the truth but youre wrong
outro
cause youre all that i want
dont you even know me at all
youre all that i need
just tell me that you still believe2embed
